```yaml
---
configVersion: v2.7
scope: application
key: governance-serviceoverride-consumer
enabled: true
configs:

  parameters:
    timeout: 6000
    mock: force:return+'this is mock'
...

```

> and I am not sure if we really need to keep the old `MonitorService` in the newer release, after all the `MonitorService` is used for exposing the monitor service for the current version. The monitor center should take care of the compatibility.

It just affects the monitor side. In a mixed environment dubbo 2.7.x will only report metrics to new interface while the older project will only report to old one. And there is no need to split the data receiver into two parts so it will just expose two services into registry and share the collecting logic.

And now it can be solved by simply adding the old interface definition into the monitor data receiver project. It's not a big problem.
we cannot change it to boolean, since we need to distinguish whether this value is set explicitly by user or not.

已经解决问题，非常感谢
可以在 `org.apache.dubbo.remoting.exchange.codec.ExchangeCodec` 的 encodeRequest 方法中找到 `checkPayload(channel, len);` 方法，`encodeRequest` 这个方法是`protected`,你可以重写它，加上自己的逻辑即可，需要基于Dubbo SPI 实现自己的`Codec2`即可。
Which thread poll you use it? In Duboo has `CachedThreadPool`,`EagerThreadPool`,`FixedThreadPool`,`LimitedThreadPool`

@beiwei30 Yes, I have look it. 
Yes, the router rules can be set to the zookeeper config center. But the problem is that when we create **application level router rule** by **dubbo-admin**, the **specified application** is an application that acts a **provider**. But the rules will be used by applications that are **consumers**. And when consumers subscribe the application level router rules, they use **their own application names**. So they can not get the rules.

这个问题其实我感觉有点麻烦，因为目前dubbo的逻辑是如果一个protocol被添加到ConfigManager中时，如果没有设置id，default没有显式设置为false，那它保存的key就是default。所以上面把设置的protocol设置为default是合逻辑的。
如果要改的话，我想到的：
1.定义protocol必须显式指定default，如果不指定则不默认为default
2.基于1，如果没有定义protocol，或者定义了protocol，但是没有定义default为ture，那么就没有default的protocol，那么没有指定protocol的Service就没有ptotocol，初始化就报错
@chickenlj 你觉得这样可以吗

> @smallnest 你好，我遇到了相同的问题，请问你解决了吗？ @bolton1643 你说的这种方式我试了，在项目中直接添加，用maven去build jar包并不会生效

不用手动添加SPI文件，可以直接在pom文件中引入
```
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.alibaba</groupId>
    <artifactId>dubbo</artifactId>
    <version>${project.parent.version}</version>
</dependency>
```
再用maven编译打包，即可。
